## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9081a9b552f5805c1eb91e604d0f7d814fb78c7f263eaff2630e5f54a7d00bc0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cugraph-service-client' @ 23.99.0 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
